about_the_game:
※This content requires the base game ”Dusk Diver2” on Steam in order to play.

Description:.
This content is a collaborative DLC with " Luminous Avenger iX 2"
After the sidequest system is unlocked, you can play the exclusive quests "Visitors from Other World" in Tumaz Mart.

By completing all relevant sub-quests you can acquire the following contents:
1. Yumo’s costume “Lola Costume”
2. Yumo’s accessoriy “Lola Headgear”
3. Yumo’s Special Skill "Support Lola"

※Sidequests may be temporarily interrupted as the game progresses.

This content includes the following items:
1."Luminous Avenger iX“ collaborative sidequest DLC “Visitors from Other World"*3
2. Yumo’s costume “Lola Costume”
3. Yumo’s accessoriy “Lola Headgear”
4. Yumo’s Special Skill "Support Lola"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
